Uses of Interface
org.drip.analytics.definition.Curve

  • Packages that use Curve 
    Package Description
    org.drip.analytics.curve  
    org.drip.analytics.definition  

    • Uses of Curve in org.drip.analytics.curve

      Classes in org.drip.analytics.curve that implement Curve 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantForwardHazard
      This class contains the baseline hazard curve holder object.
      class  ConstantForwardRate
      This class contains the constant forward bootstrapped discount curve holder object.
      class  CubicForwardRate
      This class contains the cubic forward bootstrapped discount curve holder object.
      class  DerivedFXBasis
      This class implements the FXBasis curve representing term structure of FX basis.
      class  DerivedFXForward
      This class contains the term structure of dates/times and FX forwards (PIP/outright), and Spot FX info for the given currency pair.
      class  DerivedZeroRate
      This class contains the baseline zero discount curve holder object.
      class  HyperbolicTensionForwardRate
      This class contains the hyperbolic tension forward bootstrapped discount curve holder object.
      class  LinearForwardRate
      This class contains the linear forward bootstrapped discount curve holder object.
      class  PolynomialSplineDF
      This class contains the polynomial spline discount factor based discount curve holder object.

    • Uses of Curve in org.drip.analytics.definition

      Classes in org.drip.analytics.definition that implement Curve 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreditCurve
      This class contains the baseline abstract credit curve holder object.
      class  DiscountCurve
      This class contains the baseline abstract discount curve holder object.
      class  FXBasisCurve
      This abstract class exposes the FXBasis curve representing term structure of FX basis.
      class  FXForwardCurve
      This abstract class contains the stub functionality for the term structure of dates/times and FX forwards (PIP/outright), and Spot FX info for the given currency pair.
      class  ZeroCurve
      This class contains the baseline abstract zero curve holder object.

      Curve Curve.createParallelShiftedCurve(double dblShift)
      Create a parallel quote shifted curve

      Create the curve from the tweaked parameters
